definition: the top part of a tablet
a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: During the Han Dynasty, the stone tablet sum which was habitually called the sum of seal script was mostly written with the seal script.
sentences.chinese: 兩漢時期的碑額多用篆書書寫，習慣性的被稱爲篆額。

definition: white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
short comment or critical appraisal added at the end of a text, on a painting etc
name of "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40)/see also 宀[mian2]
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
to polish a text/rhetoric/ornate language/to use florid language to conceal errors/to gloss over
